Mediterranean Exploration Company, or MEC, is a Mediterranean restaurant in Portland, Oregon's Pearl District, in the United States.
Reception
Kara Stokes and Maya MacEvoy included Cooperativa in Eater Portland 2022 overview of "Where to Eat and Drink in Portlandâ€™s Pearl District". The website included the business in a similar list in 2025.
